inclusion.criterion: Participant is willing and able to give informed consent for participation in the study.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Male or Female, aged 18 years to 60 years inclusive on the day of first vaccination.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: To be in good health as determined by medical history, physical examination and clinical judgment of the investigators.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Agree (in the Investigator's opinion) to comply with all study requirements
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Agree to allow his or her General Practitioner (and/or Consultant if appropriate), to be notified of participation in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Agree to provide their National Insurance/Passport number for the purposes of TOPS registration and bank account information for the purpose of reimbursement for the duration of their participation.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Have any known or suspected impairment or alteration of immune function, resulting from, for example: Congenital or acquired immunodeficiency (including IgA deficiency)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) infection or symptoms/signs suggestive of an HIV-associated condition
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Receipt of immunosuppressive therapy such as anti-cancer chemotherapy or radiation therapy within the preceding 12 months or long-term systemic corticosteroid therapy.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Chronic illness that could interfere with immunological function or donation of the required volumes of blood (e.g. cardiac or renal disease, diabetes, or auto-immune disorders).
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine.
